system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Staffs)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.hFpBIfoGSvtd1SE0]{Staff Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a long, quarter, or short staff as a double weapon, the character does not have to pay the additional +1 Combat Point Cost when fighting with two weapons. Additionally, the offhand is treated as a light weapon.

Normal

Attacking with two weapons cost +1 Combat Point cost.
system.summary: No +1 CP to two-weapon fight, treat off-hand weapon as small
